auth_config.name: api_key
auth_config.label: API Key
auth_config.message: API Key is used for accessing the API.

auth_config.name: api_secret
auth_config.label: API Secret
auth_config.message: API Secret is used for accessing the API.

FromName.text: Sender name that will be displayed in the recipient's mailbox

Sender.text: Sender email address will be used to send the message

Recipients.text: A json array containing the list of recipients

To.text: The email address (and name, optionally) of the recipients

Cc.text: A json array containing the list of recipients

Bcc.text: The email address of a recipient who is supposed to receive a blind carbon copy of this message

Text-part.text: Provides the Text part of the message

Html-part.text: Provides the HTML part of the message

Attachments.text: A json object containing descriptions of the files attached to this message

Mj-TemplateID.text: The Template ID or Name to use as this email content

Mj-TemplateLanguage.text: When true, activates the template language processing

Mj-TemplateErrorReporting.text: An email address, where a carbon copy with the error message is sent to in case of sending issues

Mj-TemplateErrorDeliver.text: Defines if the message will be delivered if an error is discovered in the templating language

inline_attachments.text: A json object containing descriptions of the files attached to this message

Mj-prio.text: Indicates the processing priority inside your account (API Key) scheduling queue

Mj-campaign.text: Specifies a custom campaign name, to which all messages with this property value will be assigned

Mj-deduplicatecampaign.text: Enables or disables the option to send messages from the same campaign to the same contact multiple times

Mj-trackopen.text: Enable or disable open tracking on this message

Mj-EventPayload.text: Defines a payload attached to the message

Headers.text: A JSON object containing additional email headers

Vars.text: A JSON object containing variables used to modify the content of your email

meta.description: Send a message via Send API v3

SandboxMode.text: When true, the API call will be run in Sandbox mode

AdvanceErrorHandling.text: When true, enables additional error checks relating to the Send API v3.1 payload

Globals.text: An object containing properties that will be applied to all message objects

Message.text: A json array containing message objects

meta.description: Send a message via Send API v3.1
Retrieve a list of contact lists

Action.text: Action to perform: addnoforce, addforce, remove, unsub

meta.description: Add or remove a contact from a list

EditMode.text: Edit mode: html, dragdrop, or builder
Edit mode: html, dragdrop, or builder

IsDefaultSender.text: Whether this is the default sender
Whether this is the default sender
